data.post_excerpt:
Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!
*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts
data.formula_description:
Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.

process_steps.p_description: Combine Phase A in main beaker and mix with propeller agitation.
Combine Phase B in side beaker and mix well until all powder is wet out.
Add Phase B to main beaker and propeller mix until uniform. Switch to sweep mixing once viscosity builds.
Add Phase C to main beaker and sweep mix until uniform.
Add Phase D to main beaker and sweep mix until uniform.
Combine Phase E and add to batch. Sweep mix until uniform.

data.formula_base: Barcril-AV is a sodium salt of acrylic copolymer, an absorbent powder which holds more than 20 times its dry weight in water. Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

data.post_excerpt: Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs
data.formula_description: Get the perfect brow! A brow volumizing tinted gel that creates a natural fullness and definition. The tapered brush provides an easy, mess-proof application to tame stubborn brow hairs. The buildable formula is also long-wearing giving you brows for days!

data.post_excerpt:
"This unique oil-in-water formula deeply cleanses skin and can be tissued off. Cleansing Cream melts onto the skin, releasing the oil phase and washing away all impurities, perfect for waterproof makeup!
*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts

data.post_excerpt: Cleanse the day away with this moisturizing gel that doesn’t strip the skin. The double break technology creates a refreshing burst of hydration while gently cleansing the skin of impurities
data.formula_description:
Cleanse the day away with this moisturizing gel that doesn’t strip the skin. The double break technology creates a refreshing burst of hydration while gently cleansing the skin of impurities.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

data.post_excerpt: This gorgeous burgundy color pop provides full coverage in a liquid lipstick format. Creamilicious Liquid Lipstick glides easily onto lips, leaving lips soft and conditioned
data.formula_description: This gorgeous burgundy color pop provides full coverage in a liquid lipstick format. Creamilicious Liquid Lipstick glides easily onto lips, leaving lips soft and conditioned. This fromula can also be used as a lip stain once applied and removed leaving a beautiful purple/red tint on the lips.

concept_description: Mitochondria are the “Powerhouses” of the cell. Fatty acids are transported into the mitochondria and converted via oxidation to generate ATP (a universal cellular fuel to be used by the cell when required for energy). The focus of the mitochondria is to help generate via aerobic respiration the maximum amount of energy from the nutrients that are consumed.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.

Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

data.post_excerpt: It’s all about that gloss! Formulated with a unique soufflé texture that applies like a gel but dries like a powder lasting all day. It provides high shine with a buildable coverage to get the perfect glossy eyelids
data.formula_description:
It’s all about that gloss! Formulated with a unique soufflé texture that applies like a gel but dries like a powder lasting all day. It provides high shine with a buildable coverage to get the perfect glossy eyelids. Ready, set, Gloss!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

data.post_excerpt: Mid-day slump have you feeling dehydrated? Filter-Free Mist gives just the moisturizing boost needed. The gel-to-mist technology will allow the skin to hydrate quickly during the driest afternoon hours
data.formula_description: Mid-day slump have you feeling dehydrated? Filter-Free Mist gives just the moisturizing boost needed. The gel-to-mist technology will allow the skin to hydrate quickly during the driest afternoon hours. A quick mist helps to regulate sebum production while maintaining moisturization. Spray, and take your look through the evening.

data.post_excerpt: Want a bold look? Fluid Lipstick is the answer for a bright pop of color. With its intense moisturization abilities, lips stay hydrated and smooth all day
data.formula_description: Want a bold look? Fluid Lipstick is the answer for a bright pop of color. With its intense moisturization abilities, lips stay hydrated and smooth all day. The formula easily glides onto lips to complete an effortless bold look!

data.post_excerpt:
H2O Primer is a thin, water-like primer to moisturize and prep skin for the day. Filled with 71 beneficial minerals, H2O Primer will improve the wear of makeup and maintain a healthy look all day long!
*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts

data.post_excerpt:
Need a lift? This Instant Firming Serum will give you an immediate anti-wrinkle effect with a firming sensation! Keep your skin hydrated all day for a rejuvenated, fresh look!
*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version

data.post_excerpt: This weightless Jelly Foundation gives your skin a healthy tinted glow filled with lasting hydration. Create an even complexion, covering imperfections, with this bouncy, spreadable foundation
data.formula_description:
This weightless Jelly Foundation gives your skin a healthy tinted glow filled with lasting hydration. Create an even complexion, covering imperfections, with this bouncy, spreadable foundation. Jelly Foundation will moisturize your skin all day for a smooth, lasting look.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

data.post_excerpt: This Liquid Cleanser is a great for removing makeup, including tough to remove waterproof makeup. It removes both water and oil based pigments, and leaves skin feeling smooth and refreshed
data.formula_description: This Liquid Cleanser is a great for removing makeup, including tough to remove waterproof makeup. It removes both water and oil based pigments, and leaves skin feeling smooth and refreshed. The Liquid Cleanser prepares skin for a natural look or full glam!

data.post_excerpt: Bring your mascara back to life! This mascara refresher is perfect for a quick touch-up designed to instantly revive, separate and define every lash. A serum-like formulation that will help to increase eyelash length and volume with the incorporation of natural source actives
data.formula_description:
Bring your mascara back to life! This mascara refresher is perfect for a quick touch-up designed to instantly revive, separate and define every lash. A serum-like formulation that will help to increase eyelash length and volume with the incorporation of natural source actives. Say goodbye to stiff lashes and refresh your eyes!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

data.post_excerpt: An easy-to-apply and highly blendable stick created the perfect, lightweight  no-makeup makeup look! A creamy texture formulated with mineral powders, pigments and moisturizers to get the full coverage look without feeling it! This is the perfect  filter-free stick foundation to take with you from morning to night!
data.formula_description: An easy-to-apply and highly blendable stick created the perfect, lightweight no-makeup makeup look! A creamy texture formulated with mineral powders, pigments and moisturizers to get the full coverage look without feeling it! This is the perfect filter-free stick foundation to take with you from morning to night!

data.post_excerpt: A pocket sized, easy to carry, dewy stick essence which contains approximately 65% moisturizing ingredients. It keeps the skin soft and dewy all day long! Perfect for travel and everyday use to condition and moisturize skin, both at home and on the go!
data.formula_description: A pocket sized, easy to carry, dewy stick essence which contains approximately 65% moisturizing ingredients. It keeps the skin soft and dewy all day long! Perfect for travel and everyday use to condition and moisturize skin, both at home and on the go!

data.post_excerpt: Finish the perfect look with a hint of red! The Natural Lipstick has a smooth, absorbing finish that glides right onto your lips, leaving a beautiful shiny red tint and a light coconut smell behind. Show off your natural beauty with this essential lip formula!
data.formula_description: Finish the perfect look with a hint of red! The Natural Lipstick has a smooth, absorbing finish that glides right onto your lips, leaving a beautiful shiny red tint and a light coconut smell behind. Show off your natural beauty with this essential lip formula!

data.post_excerpt: Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion
data.formula_description: Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. A combination of actives derived from pomegranate and other plants target the function and performance of melanocytes, preventing and reducing the appearance of dark spots and brightening the complexion.

data.post_excerpt: Keep skin clean, healthy, and soft with the Self-Emulsifying Cleanser. This advanced cleansing system self-emulsifies with water allowing easy removal of oil
data.formula_description: Keep skin clean, healthy, and soft with the Self-Emulsifying Cleanser. This advanced cleansing system self-emulsifies with water allowing easy removal of oil. Without stripping the lipid barrier, the Self-Emulsifying Cleanser effectively removes makeup and impurities.

data.post_excerpt: "Protect and repair the skin! This hydrating cream acts as a skin tone corrector to create a flawless, even skin. Infused with Vitamin C ester that fights the first visible sings of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support
data.formula_description:
"Protect and repair the skin! This hydrating cream acts as a skin tone corrector to create a flawless, even skin. Infused with Vitamin C ester that fights the first visible sings of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support. Blended with Japanese extracts and sugars helps the skin to reduce urban-induced dark spots by a unique melanin dispersion mechanism. Bye bye age spots!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version."

data.post_excerpt: A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.
data.formula_description: A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

data.post_excerpt: "Calm your skin with Soothing Pressed Serum, designed to brighten and clarify skin while reducing irritation and redness. Infused with actives that help accelerate the recovery of blemishes, this soothing serum will melt into your skin  for a nourished, clear complexion
data.formula_description:
"Calm your skin with Soothing Pressed Serum, designed to brighten and clarify skin while reducing irritation and redness. Infused with actives that help accelerate the recovery of blemishes, this soothing serum will melt into your skin for a nourished, clear complexion.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version."

data.post_excerpt: Sprayable Foundation is a luxurious blend of pigments creating a buildable coverage. This foundation is not only convenient with it’s sprayable properties, but it also acts a strong moisturizer with lasting hydration and has an anti-wrinkle effect that will firm and tighten you skin
data.formula_description: Sprayable Foundation is a luxurious blend of pigments creating a buildable coverage. This foundation is not only convenient with it’s sprayable properties, but it also acts a strong moisturizer with lasting hydration and has an anti-wrinkle effect that will firm and tighten you skin. Just spray, blend, and take on the day!

data.post_excerpt: This silicone system will provide long wear and resistance against water and perspiration while protecting against the sun’s rays. Unlike oil-in-water formulas, sunscreens remain on top of the skin instead of being absorbed to create a shield between the sun and skin barrier
data.formula_description: This silicone system will provide long wear and resistance against water and perspiration while protecting against the sun’s rays. Unlike oil-in-water formulas, sunscreens remain on top of the skin instead of being absorbed to create a shield between the sun and skin barrier. Protect your skin with W/Si Physical Sunscreen!

data.post_excerpt: Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush
data.formula_description: Fake a flush! A high silky-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skintones. The buildable formula blends effortlessly for a fool-proof application with a pop of color close to your natural flush. Just with a couple of drops it delivers the perfect amount of long-lasting color for sheer to high-impact looks.

data.post_excerpt: Air meets Water for light texture with a burst of hydration! This unique texture is due to the wet processing of the shadow. Apply either color of the Wet Shadow for a rush of sheer color or to achieve the perfect micro-detail
data.formula_description: Air meets Water for light texture with a burst of hydration! This unique texture is due to the wet processing of the shadow. Apply either color of the Wet Shadow for a rush of sheer color or to achieve the perfect micro-detail. *Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.
